scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:web && npm run deploy:infra && npm run upload:s3 && npm run flush:cdn
scripts.upload:s3: BUCKET=$(AWS_PROFILE=prod pulumi stack output bucketNameOut -s prod) && aws s3 sync dist s3://$BUCKET --delete --profile prod
scripts.flush:cdn: DIST_ID=$(AWS_PROFILE=prod pulumi stack output distributionId -s prod) && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $DIST_ID --paths '/*' --profile prod
